nodes.text: This Imperial individual served the warlord Jerec as an operations officer of his fleet while his forces occupied the planet of Ruusan. In 5 ABY, he noticed that the transport High Hauler, which had recently arrived at the planet, steered toward a restricted Class I security zone. The officer did not report it and wrote it off to the commanding officer's lack of experience, while in fact, this maneuver allowed the ship's commanding officer, lieutenant Hortu Agar—in reality, the Rebel Alfonso Luiz Obota—to unload a ship carrying two Rebel infiltrators, Kyle Katarn and Jan Ors.
